vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.11;
brother of: Chelub (H3620)
§ Shuah = "wealth"
1) a Judaite, brother of Chelub
1a) also 'Shuhah'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   pozo, a menudo usado metafóricamente; (2)   hombre; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書哈 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "富裕"
一位猶大人, 基綠的兄弟 #代上 4:11|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
书哈 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "富裕"
一位犹大人, 基绿的兄弟 #代上 4:11|
